name: Happy Family Spring Holiday
description:
Spring is a lovely reminder of how beautiful change can truly be!

From the series of Virtual Family Fun Holidays: Hillside Farm here it comes the new and exciting Spring Vacations 2018 - Happy Family Game!

It’s all about having fun and enjoyment at Spring Vacations!

Forget about other boring routines and open the Pandora of amusement and fun. Play the variety of activities like Scavenger hunt, four leaf clover, puddle jumping, and collect strawberries, wall decoration with flowers, kite flying, fishing and many more. There are different activities in each room. Your task is to keep the family happy in the midst of lovely weather.

There are many different random events to respond to, all of them adding surprise to this simulation game and unexpected elements to routine, daily virtual life. This is task based game. Every level has variety of tasks to complete, with completion of every level variety of tasks increases.

Full of enjoyment with ultimate experience of excitement are waiting for you. The 3D spring environment and addictive game play with endless adventure enhance the fun of game.

Random surprise events will come up and catch you off guard, so be ready! With a cheerful soundtrack, accurate 3D graphics, and realistic physics, this is a game for everybody!

Spring Vacations 2018 - Happy Family Game Features:
• Realistic 3D house environment & graphics
• Different fun packed household activities missions
• Smooth background music
• Engaging game play
• Easy & fun to play
• Enjoy spring season with Family Life simulation game
